footer.address: Arístides García Mella Street, #23-27, Santo Domingo

aboutUs.title: GET TO KNOW US!
aboutUs.dt1: is a technology services and information analysis company, whose main objective is to help its partners and clients achieve their proposed objectives.
aboutUs.dt2: Composed of a team of economists, mathematicians and programmers with more than 5 years of experience, we try to make our clients more and more productive through their processes and the analysis of information from the correct point of view.
aboutUs.missionDesc: Provide scalable and innovative solutions, in order to streamline processes and improve decision-making.
aboutUs.visionDesc: Accompany our clients to achieve their objectives, improving their processes and quality of information. To be a reference in the analysis of information and new technologies.

solutions.title: SERVICES AND PRODUCTS ACCORDING TO YOUR NEEDS
solutions.subTitle: Better processes, better decisions. Products made to fit our clients.
solutions.analysisBody: We implement solutions and platforms which help our clients to analyze their information in more detail, increasing the quality of decision making.
solutions.softwareQuote: "IN THE AGE WE LIVE IN, COMPANIES THAT DON'T ADAPT ARE DOOMED TO FAIL"
solutions.softwareBody: We create customized platforms and programs for our clients in order to streamline processes and reduce costs.
